mapper.select: SELECT ctn.CTSNN_ID AS "ctsnnId" , ctn.USER_ID AS "usid" , ctn.CTSNN_CODE AS "ctsnnCd" , ctn.REQST_DE AS "reqstDe" , ctn.CTSNN_NM AS "ctsnnNm" , ctn.TRGTER_NM AS "trgterNm" , ctn.BRTHDY AS "brth" , ctn.OCCRRNC_DE AS "occrrDe" , ctn.RELATE AS "relate" , ctn.RM AS "remark" , ctn.SANCTNER_ID AS "sanctnerId" , ctn.CONFM_AT AS "confmAt" , ctn.SANCTN_DT AS "sanctnDt" , ctn.RETURN_RESN AS "returnResn" , ctn.INFRML_SANCTN_ID AS "infrmlSanctnId" , mst.USER_NM AS "usNm" , (select org.ORGNZT_NM from COMTN_ORGNZT_INFO org where org.ORGNZT_ID = mst.ORGNZT_ID ) AS "orgnztNm" , (select mst1.USER_NM from COMVN_USER_MASTER mst1 where mst1.ESNTL_ID = SANCTNER_ID ) AS "sanctnerNm" , (select code_nm from COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE where code_id ='COM054' and code = ctn.CTSNN_CODE ) AS "ctsnnCdNm" , (select code_nm from COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE where code_id ='COM073' and code = ctn.RELATE ) AS "relateNm" , (select info.ORGNZT_NM from COMVN_USER_MASTER mst_b , COMTN_ORGNZT_INFO info where info.ORGNZT_ID = mst_b.ORGNZT_ID and mst_b.esntl_id= ctn.SANCTNER_ID ) AS "sanctnerOrgnztNm" FROM COMTN_CTSNN_MANAGE ctn LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER mst ON ctn.USER_ID = mst.ESNTL_ID WHERE ctn.CTSNN_ID = #{ctsnnId}
